Name: Cary Leeds Tennis Center at Crotona Park
Info: Lessons are offered. During the indoor season (The day after Columbus Day – April 27), there are 10 outdoor courts available, and 10 courts are bubbled and can be rented for a fee. During the outdoor season, there are 15 courts available to Parks tennis permit holders. For booking courts and program information please call or visit Cary Leeds Tennis Center's website for more information.

Name: Seton Park
Location: W. 232nd to 235th St., Palisade and Independence Aves.

Name: Decatur Playground
Location: Decatur bet. Summer and Lewis Aves.

Name: Lucille Ferrier Tennis Courts (Dyker Beach Park)
Location: Cropsey Avenue, Bay 8th Street and Poly Place

Name: McCarren Tennis Center
Location: North 13th Street Between Berry Street and Bedford Avenue
Info: Lessons are offered. All 7 courts are bubbled during the indoor season (the day after Columbus Day-April 27) and may be rented for a fee. During the outdoor season, there are 6 courts available to Parks tennis permit holders. For bookings or for more information about tennis at McCarren Park, please visit McCarren Tennis Center.

Name: Prospect Park Tennis Center
Location: Parkside Ave at the Parade Ground
Info: Lessons are available. During the indoor season (October 23-May 6), there are 11 bubbled courts that may be rented for a fee. During the outdoor season, 8 courts are available to Parks tennis permit holders. For more information, visit the Prospect Park Alliance tennis page.

Name: Fort Washington Park
Info: Lessons offered by Riverside Tennis Association; sign up at RiversideTennis.org

Name: Maurice Park
Location: Maurice Ave., LIE Service Rd. Westbound

Name: Wolfe's Pond Park
Location: Cornelia Ave., off of Hylan Blvd.

Name: Sportime at Randall's Island
Info:
The Sportime Tennis Center is a concession offering 12 courts to NYC Parks Tennis Permit holders during the outdoor season, which is from the Friday before Memorial Day through Labor Day. For more information, visit the Sportime Randall's Island tennis page. Designated NYC Parks Courts:

  • Walk-ins only for designated NYC Parks courts and Online Reservation System for limited amount of courts to be reserved and paid ahead of time.
  • limited to one (1) hour for singles play, and two (2) hours for doubles play, although players may keep playing after their reserved times have ended if courts are available, upon confirming such availability with club staff.
  • All players using designated NYC Parks courts must affiliate with SPORTIME as an associate/non-member, and complete a waiver, prior to play. No Exceptions.
  • A reserved court is forfeited if the reserving player has not arrived by 5 minutes past the start time.

Name: Sutton Tennis at Queensboro Oval
Location: York Ave. Between E 59 St. & E 60 St.
Info: Lessons are offered. Six courts are available to NYC Parks tennis permit holders from April 14 - September 14. For booking courts and program information please call or visit Sutton East Tennis Club's website.

Name: Commonpoint Queens Tennis and Athletic Center at Alley Pond
Info: Lessons offered. During the indoor season (October - April), 11 courts are available to rent for a fee. During the outdoor season (May – September), 11 courts are available for Parks tennis permit holders. For booking courts and program information please call (718) 255-2127 or visit Commonpoint Queens Tennis and Athletic Center’s website.

Name: South Oxford Park
Location: Cumberland Street between Atlantic Commons and Atlantic Avenue

Name: Governor Smith Playground
Location: Morris Avenue between E. 151 and E. 153 Streets

Name: Cooper Park Tennis Courts
Location: Morgan Ave, between Maspeth Ave and Sharon St
